Function Documentation

◆ mlx_io_reader_descriptor()

int mlx_io_reader_descriptor ( void ** desc_,
mlx_io_reader io )

Get IO reader user descriptor.

◆ mlx_io_reader_free()

int mlx_io_reader_free ( mlx_io_reader io)

Free IO reader.

Note that MLX arrays are lazily evaluated, so the underlying object may be not freed right away. The free() callback from mlx_io_vtable will be called when the underlying object is actually freed.

◆ mlx_io_reader_new()

mlx_io_reader mlx_io_reader_new ( void * desc,
mlx_io_vtable vtable )

Returns a new custom IO reader.

vtable operates on user descriptor desc.

◆ mlx_io_writer_free()

int mlx_io_writer_free ( mlx_io_writer io)

Free IO writer.

Note that MLX arrays are lazily evaluated, so the underlying object may be not freed right away. The free() callback from mlx_io_vtable will be called when the underlying object is actually freed.
